jade.security.impl

Class JADEAuthorityImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • jade.security.impl.JADEAuthorityImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JADEAuthority

    public class JADEAuthorityImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JADEAuthority
    This class is the base class to perform cryptographic operations. JADEAuthorityImpl has methods for signing and encrypting on behalf of a principal.
    Version:
    $Date: 2007-04-24 16:20:28 +0200 (mar, 24 apr 2007) $ $Revision: 1001 $
    Author:
    Giosue Vitaglione - Telecom Italia LAB, Nicolas Lhuillier - Motorola, Jerome Picault - Motorola
